classification.intended_installation_point: Main service entrance / primary distribution panel
classification.electrical_environment: High-energy industrial and commercial power systems

overview.positioning_headline: Two-stage primary surge protection for extreme electrical environments
marketing_paragraphs: From the main distribution panel, the Mach 5 SPD System isolates your sensitive downline equipment from nearby switching motor loads, lightning-induced surges, and internally generated electrical noise.

By creating a complete grid of non-degrading surge protection, SurgePure systems preserve critical assets, reduce equipment downtime, and maximize long-term system reliability and operational profits.
Mach 5 products are specifically engineered for today’s harsh electrical environments, including rolling blackouts, brownouts, and high fault-current industrial systems.
overview.technical_positioning: The SurgePure Mach 5 SPD System is a primary level, two-stage, Dual-Mode surge protective device designed for extremely high surge-current exposure and large-capacity electrical services.

bulleted_features: Your most vital primary level defense against today’s rolling blackouts and brownouts
Two-stage, Dual-Mode surge protection architecture for superior energy dissipation
Unique Dual-Mode fuse-links maintain safety of non-degrading, high-energy surge capacity
Designed for easy mounting and installation for fast response-time protection
Up to one million amps of solid, safe, single-element parallel surge protection
Surge Cushion technology reduces electrical noise and power pollution

safety_claims: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2
Highest TVSS industry SCCR rating of 200kAIC

status_indicators.description: Lifetime green LED self-test protection status monitors for each phase

optional_features.name: Remote Aware
optional_features.description: Auto-remote surge protection status alert capability
